name: Shards the Deckbuilder
description: Shards the Deckbuilder is a new breed of digital deckbuilding game that uses the popular Cerberus game engine by Cryptozoic Entertainment. Combining deep strategy and fast paced fantasy elements, build up your deck to defeat an array of deadly foes. Mythic Adventures allows players to challenge the AI to defeat the treasure hoarding boss and win the game to unlock the Mythic frame version of your cards. Raids offer players the opportunity to team up with other friends or other players to take down epic monsters and earn incredible rewards.
